name: Wonderful Pistachios No Shells, 3 Flavors Mixed Variety Pack of 9 (0.75 Ounce), Roasted & Salted Nuts (4), Chili (3), Honey (2), Protein Snacks, Gluten Free, Healthy Snacks Variety Pack for Adults
short_description: SIZE: Pack of 9 (0.75 Ounce) No Shells – Don’t hold back on Wonderful Pistachios; Our Wonderful Pistachios are the perfect snack to have around the house and for on-the-go; These healthy snacks are the perfect, convenient pantry staple; See nutrition information for fat

FLAVOR: Each Box includes (4) 0.75 oz Bags of Roasted and Salted No Shell Wonderful Pistachios, (3) 0.75 oz Bags of Chili Roasted No Shell Wonderful Pistachios, and (2) 0.75 oz Bags of Honey Roasted No Shell Wonderful Pistachios. Same delicious taste, but with a little less work for you
CALIFORNIA GROWN: Wonderful Pistachios grows all of its pistachios in California orchards, where we carefully tend and harvest using the latest in sustainable practices.

HEALTHY SNACKING: Pistachios are a healthy, protein-powered addition to any gathering - from party to picnic. Pistachios are a healthy choice for snacking on-the-go and around the house. They make for a wonderful pantry staple, travel snack, or office snack
SIMPLY WONDERFUL PISTACHIOS: Gluten Free, Plant Based Protein, Kosher Certified, Halal Certified, and Non-GMO Project Verified. Contains tree nuts (pistachios), a good source of copper and vitamin B6
product_description: One box of nine (9) 0.75 Ounce Bags of our No Shells Wonderful Pistachios Whether you’re craving something sweet, spicy, or savory, Wonderful Pistachios No Shells has a flavor for everyone, with 9 bags of protein-powered, grab-and-go goodness. Get Snackin’! Each Box includes (4) 0.75 Ounce Bags of Roasted and Salted, No Shells Wonderful Pistachios, (3) 0.75 Ounce Bags of Chili Roasted, No Shells Wonderful Pistachios, and (2) 0.75 Ounce Bags of Honey Roasted, No Shells Wonderful Pistachios. Roasted and Salted Wonderful Pistachios have literally come out of their shells. Same delicious taste, but with a little less work for you. Still great for snacking, they’re also a wonderful addition to your culinary creations. Wonderful Pistachios are a smart, healthy choice for folks around the world. Wonderful Pistachios grows all of its pistachios in California’s fertile San Joaquin Valley. The warm days and cool nights work in harmony with the region’s natural soils to create the perfect growing climate. We then carefully tend and harvest each pistachio using the latest in sustainable practices. Nutritious and healthy pistachios are great as part of an overall healthy diet. Pistachios are also a good source of plant protein. And in addition to tasting great, a single serving includes about 49 pistachios, enough to satisfy your snacking needs. Note: Contains Tree Nuts (pistachios).

name: Kar’s Nuts Variety Pack Trail Mix Snacks -Yogurt Apple Nut, Mango Pineapple Mix, Sweet ‘N Spicy – Grab & Go Bags, Individual Snack Packs (Pack of 24), Gluten-Free Trail Mix Snack
short_description: TRAIL MIX SNACKS: Satisfy your craving with Kar’s Nuts Variety Pack Trail Mix. This bulk trail mix includes (24) individually wrapped snacks, making it a perfect variety pack snack for travel, lunchboxes, and on-the-go snacking.
VARIETY PACK: Satisfy every craving with (6) Yogurt Apple Nut, (6) Mango Pineapple Mix, (12) Sweet N' Spicy Mix individually wrapped snacks.

GLUTEN-FREE GOODNESS: This Kar’s Nuts trail mix is proudly gluten-free, with no hydrogenated oils or trans fats, & is Kosher certified. Enjoy a feel-good snack that is crafted with quality ingredients for you and your family.

INDIVIDUAL TRAIL MIX PACKS – These bulk snacks are individually wrapped and ready to enjoy. Our conveniently packaged nut mix will leave you satisfyingly full. They’re great for travel snacks, kids’ lunches, concessions, office breakrooms and more.

KAR’S NUTS – AMERICA’S FAVORITE: Born in Detroit in 1933, Kar’s Nuts pioneered the Sweet ‘N Salty Mix & remains the MVP of trail mix. We transform the way people snack with blends inspired by universally loved flavor combinations, crafted to satisfy.
product_description: Satisfy your hunger with Kar’s Nuts Variety Pack Trail Mix, a delicious gluten-free snack mix crafted with quality ingredients you can feel good about. Satisfy every craving with the Kar’s Nuts Trail Mix Variety Pack that includes (6) Yogurt Apple Nut, (6) Mango Pineapple Mix, (12) Sweet N' Spicy Mix single serve snack packs.These nut snack packs satisfy every craving and deliver a perfect Kar’s trail mix experience. Kar’s Nuts, America’s Favorite trail mix brand, has been crafting tasty nut snacks in favorite flavor combinations since 1933. Our convenient individual snack packs keep your snack fresh and ready for travel, offices, kids’ lunches, or on-the-go snacking. Enjoy this Variety Pack Trail Mix knowing it is free of hydrogenated oils and trans fats, gluten-free, and Kosher certified. Whether you’re seeking a high-energy snack for your busy lifestyle or an indulgent trail mix that delivers on taste, Kar’s Variety Pack Trail Mix is your go-to. Pioneering the Sweet 'N Salty Mix movement, we've led the way in transforming how America snacks — and America agreed.

product_description: Who are we? short_description: FOR EVERY DIET, ANYWHERE. Did someone say yummy for all? Each trail mix inside our Healthy Trail Mix Snack Packs are proudly vegan, dairy-free, and gluten-free. The convenient size makes these individual packs perfect for savvy snackers on the move. Whether you’re adventuring or at the office, or filling your child’s lunch box, these snacks are as functional as they are delicious.

TOP SHELF INGREDIENTS. All Nature’s Garden products, including our Healthy Trail Mix Snack Packs are made with all natural ingredients. That means we take the finest quality nuts, berries, and fruit mother nature has to offer and create snacks that go beyond simply satisfying hunger. So rest assured, when you buy Nature’s Garden, you’re buying the absolute best.

FREE FROM NASTIES. We’ve ditched the bad stuff and are committed to bringing you that good good. Each mix inside our Healthy Trail Mix Snack Pack is free from preservatives, trans fats, GMOs, artificial ingredients, artificial flavors, cholesterol, and sodium. Whew! Take a big exhale and chow down without second guessing.

WALLET-FRIENDLY. How do you make a totally delicious, insanely nutritious, and crazy convenient snack even better? Buy in bulk and make it budget-friendly! Our Healthy Trail Mix Snack Packs come in a bundle of 24 individual packets featuring three of our best-selling trail mixes. The perfect way to indulge in a variety of yummy, for less.

KICKSTART YOUR HEART. Each of the trail mixes inside our Healthy Trail Mix Snack Packs proudly wear the healthy heart banner. This means that you can munch guilt-free, knowing you’re treating your heart (and soul) to a snack with a greater purpose.
